identified-content.person: GINTER, DR. HEIDI BRITT (DR. HEIDI BRITT SHAH)

block.p: Dr. Heidi Britt Ginter, a daughter of Debbe Cotter of Cockeysville, Md., and John Ginter of Burlington, N.C., was married yesterday to Nilesh Vinod Shah, a son of Ranjan and Vinod Shah of Irvington, N.Y. The Rev. William Bliss, a Congregational minister, performed the ceremony at the Elkridge Club in Baltimore.
The couple graduated from Yale University, where they met.

Dr. Heidi Britt Ginter, a daughter of Debbe Cotter of Cockeysville, Md., and John Ginter of Burlington, N.C., was married yesterday to Nilesh Vinod Shah, a son of Ranjan and Vinod Shah of Irvington, N.Y. The Rev. William Bliss, a Congregational minister, performed the ceremony at the Elkridge Club in Baltimore.
The couple graduated from Yale University, where they met.

Dr. Ginter Shah, 29, received her medical degree from the University of Maryland at Baltimore. She is a family physician at the Great Brook Valley Health Center and an assistant professor of family medicine at the University of Massachusetts, both in Worcester, Mass. Her father is the general manager at Franklin Selections, a wine distributor in Burlington. Her mother is the chairwoman of the computer science department at Loyola Blakefield, a private school in Towson, Md.

Mr. Shah, 30, is a managing director in charge of financial negotiations at Internet Venture Works, an Internet consulting firm in Boston. He is also a candidate for an M.B.A. degree at the University of Pennsylvania. His parents own the Tremont Motel in West Haven, Conn.
